channel.title: Get Started on Apache Flink CDC
channel.description: Recent content in Get Started on Apache Flink CDC

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to Flink CDC ðŸŽ‰ # Flink CDC is a streaming data integration tool that aims to provide users with a more robust API. It allows users to describe their ETL pipeline logic via YAML elegantly and help users automatically generating customized Flink operators and submitting job. Flink CDC prioritizes optimizing the task submission process and offers enhanced functionalities such as schema evolution, data transformation, full database synchronization and exactly-once semantic.
